'''Photographer of Teyvat Desert Theme''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Event Duration==
September 28, 2022 – October 25, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)<br>
Results and Winners List Announcement:<br>
The list of winners will be updated in [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/9406153 this event post] on November 8, 2022.

==Event Details==
A new theme will be revealed every week for four consecutive weeks. Do remember to check regularly and participate~
Let's take a look at the first week's photography theme!

===Week 1: Precious Desert Oases===
{{Description|As a Traveler walking into the Sumeru desert, you would not want to miss the oases symbolizing life and vitality that are scattered around the area.<br>Clear springs and thirsting vegetation together constitute such unique sights in the desert. Travelers, who would you most like to team up with on your way to find an oasis?}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/9406153
* Event Duration:
** September 28, 2022 – October 4, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** Use the topic #Photographer of Teyvat to publish a post to share your photos of "Desert Oases of Sumeru" and introduce your party composition when exploring the desert area.
** 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems ×300 each.

===Week 2: Mysterious Desert Creatures===
{{Description|In the desert beyond the forest, what strange-looking creatures have you encountered?<br>Document them with that Kamera in your hand!}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/11438447
* Event Duration:
** October 5, 2022 – October 11, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** Use the topic #Photographer of Teyvat to publish a post to share your photos of "Desert Creatures of Sumeru." Do also introduce your favorite desert creature and why.
** 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems ×300 each.

===Week 3: Ancient Desert Ruins===
{{Description|Ancient temples, huge statues... In the vast desert, in addition to the natural landscape, visitors are more than often captivated by the various ruins there.<br>Have you been in awe and impressed? Don't forget to capture the moments with your Kamera!}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/12178673
* Event Duration:
** October 12, 2022 – October 18, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** Use the topic #Photographer of Teyvat to publish a post to share your photos of "Desert Ruins of Sumeru" and your puzzle-solving experience when exploring them.
** 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems

===Week 4: Encounter With The Eremites===
{{Description|As settlers from an ancient civilization in the desert, The Eremites are nothing short of a force to be reckoned with. Travelers, watch out for them when exploring Sumeru!<br>So, what were your encounters with The Eremites like? Care to show us some photos?}}
* Event Post: https://www.hoyolab.com/article/12739971
* Event Duration:
** October 19, 2022 – October 25, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* How to Participate & Rewards:
** Leave your comments under this post to share your photos taken while battling The Eremites in the desert. The more intense and thrilling the picture, the higher the chance of winning!
** 10 Travelers will be selected from those who have posted according to the requirements to receive Primogems ×100 each.

==Notes==
